lead_paragraph: Syracuse coach Jim Boeheim doesn't like using the term "clean" to describe a college sports program, because the opposite of that would mean "dirty."

headline.print_headline: 2 Teams Afoul of NCAA Meet in Final 4 'Infraction Bowl'
headline.main: 2 Teams Afoul of NCAA Meet in Final 4 'Infraction Bowl'
